name: 1Code
description: Open source Cursor-like UI for Claude Code, providing a visual interface with diff previews, built-in git client, and support for running agents in parallel across multiple worktrees.
community_quotes: Claude Code finally has a usable UI, this open source project is amazing
Run Claude Code agents in parallel with Git Worktrees support
Provides the missing graphical interface for Claude Code

name: relayd
description: Remote control interface for Codex agents, enabling developers to manage and ship code from anywhere with remote agent orchestration capabilities.
community_quotes: Remote control for your Codex agents - ship from anywhere
Featured in Product Hunt Best of January 20, 2026 leaderboard

name: Coderrr
description: Open source CLI-first AI coding companion that runs in the terminal, understands codebases, helps generate/refactor code, explains bugs, and creates actionable plans.
community_quotes: Free and open-source alternative to Claude Code
CLI-first AI coding companion that understands your codebase

name: flins
description: Universal skill and command manager for AI coding tools, acting as a dependency manager for AI agent skills with familiar commands like add, update, remove, and list across 16+ platforms.
community_quotes: Like npm for AI agent skills - manage capabilities across 16+ platforms
Reduces friction when sharing and maintaining agent skills across teams

name: Phoenix CLI
description: Command-line interface for retrieving trace data from Phoenix, enabling AI coding assistants to access observability data through terminal and file interfaces for debugging AI agents.

name: Knowns CLI
description: AI-first CLI for task management and documentation that links docs in tasks and reads context automatically to avoid repeating patterns in development workflows.

name: Cowork
description: Turns Claude into your digital coworker for collaborative development tasks, providing AI-powered collaboration capabilities for software development teams.

name: WebTerm
description: Browser terminal sandbox for learning CLI without fear, emphasizing CLI literacy for both engineers and non-engineers in the AI era.
